src.database package¶

Submodules¶

src.database.database module¶

Database¶

This module consists of the functions related to data read and write.

class src.database.database.Database(URI='mongodb://localhost:27017')¶

Bases: object

This is the database class consisting of the read and write operations to the database.

client¶

mongodb client

db¶

the database object

squares collection

players_col¶

players collection

insert_points()¶

inserts points to the database

insert_player()¶

inserts a single player to the database

find_square_id()¶

finds a square and the current and actual clicker of the square

game_over_request()¶

updates a player, that the players game is over

get_players()¶

returns the list of all players

get_final_ranks()¶

returns the list of all players along with their ranks

decrease_player()¶

updates the player that the player has disconnected from server.

decrease_player(player_id)

When a player disconnects from the server, server keeps a updates the player row such that the player is disconnected.

Parameters:player_id (int) – id of the dis-connecting player
Returns:how many players are still connected to the server
Return type:int
find_square_id(square_id, player_id, clicked_at)

Find a square with the given id and whether it is clicked previously.

Parameters:
  • square_id (int) – id the of the square
  • player_id (int) – id of the player who currently has clicked the square.
  • clicked_at (datetime.datetime) – timestamp when the player has clicked on the square.
Returns:

id of the player who has previously clicked on the square and id of the player who is actual owner of the square points as of now.
Return type:

tuple
game_over_request(player_id)

Updates a player row when that player’s game is over.

Parameters:player_id (int) – id of the player
Returns:whether all of the players game is over or not
Return type:bool
get_final_ranks()

Returns list of all players

Returns:list of all players
Return type:list
get_players()

Returns list of all players

Returns:list of all players
Return type:mongodb doc list
insert_player(player)

Insert a single player to the database.

Parameters:player (dictionary) – {‘id’:int,’name’:str,’points’:0}
insert_points(squares)

Insert all of the coordinates of the squares. Each time before inserting all of the points the database clears its previous records.

Parameters:squares (dictionary) – {‘id’:int,’x0’:int,’y0’:int}
